name: Merge Fairies - Best Idle Clicker
description:
A new adventure from the creators of the game Dragons: Miracle Collection. Discover the magical islands in the mysterious world of Merge Fairies. Here you can combine any items and make them better and more beautiful.

Combine flower buds and lead them to a new level, and then improve and develop them! Pass and solve difficult and interesting puzzles: combine objects to get new fairies and collect rewards.

Discovering new enchanted islands is possible only with the help of YOUR unusual ability TO MERGE EVERYTHING: magic flowers, shells, fairies and mermaids.

Reveal wonders on your island while merging objects and perfecting your creations!

FEATURES Merge Fairies:

• Discover over 100 fantastic objects to connect, merge and interact in 50 challenges!
• Collect fairies, mermaids, unicorns, minotaurs and unprecedented hybrid creatures.
• Catch the flying monster and get prizes
• An evil curse has been placed on the fairy garden!
• Gather a collection of over 100 mystical creatures
• Participate in events - so you get more prizes and awards.
• Take part in a tournament with friends around the world and get weekly rewards.

Merge Fairies created by Octopus Game. This studio has pleased you with Dragons: Miracle Collection.
